service.name: /esal108.es
service.query: SELECT A.SALE_DT AS SALE_DT , A.POS_NO||'-'||DPS.FN_GET_POS_NAME(A.STR_CD, A.POS_NO) AS POS_NAME , A.TRAN_NO AS TRAN_CD , SUBSTR(C.SALE_TIME, 1, 2)||':'||SUBSTR(C.SALE_TIME, 3, 2)||':'||SUBSTR(C.SALE_TIME, 5, 2) AS SALE_TIME --, COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'P611', C.TRAN_MODE) AS TRAN_MODE , DECODE(A.REJCT_FLAG,1,'지정취소',COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'P611', C.TRAN_MODE)) AS TRAN_MODE , DECODE(C.TRAN_FLAG, '1', '반품', '2', '오타', '정상') AS TRAN_FLAG --, DECODE(C.TRAN_MODE, '92', 0, DECODE(C.TRAN_FLAG, '1', -A.SALE_AMT-A.DC_PRC, '2', -A.SALE_AMT-A.DC_PRC, A.SALE_AMT+A.DC_PRC)) AS AMT , DECODE(A.REJCT_FLAG,1,0,DECODE(C.TRAN_MODE, '92', 0, DECODE(C.TRAN_FLAG, '1', -A.SALE_AMT-A.DC_PRC, '2', -A.SALE_AMT-A.DC_PRC, A.SALE_AMT+A.DC_PRC))) AS AMT , DECODE(C.O_POS_NO, NULL, ' ', C.O_POS_NO||'-'||DPS.FN_GET_POS_NAME(C.STR_CD, C.O_POS_NO)) AS O_POS_NO , C.O_SALE_DT , C.O_TRAN_NO , C.DC_TOT_AMT FROM DPS.PS_TRITEM A , DPS.PC_PBNMST B , DPS.PS_TRHEADER C WHERE A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND C.SALE_DT = A.SALE_DT AND C.STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND C.POS_NO = A.POS_NO AND C.TRAN_NO = A.TRAN_NO AND A.SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND A.VEN_CD = ? AND B.PUMBUN_TYPE IN ('0', '4', 'B') /* 일괄취소까지 보고 싶지 않을때 주석 풀기 */ --AND C.TRAN_MODE NOT IN ('92') ORDER BY 1,2,3
